section.title: Table Components

listitem.para: Use this action to check if a cell in a table is editable.
You enter the cell you want to check and whether you expect it to be editable or not.

section.para: This action is unsupported for the HTML toolkit

listitem.para: Use this action to check whether a table cell at the current mouse position is editable or not.

section.para: This action is unsupported for the HTML toolkit

listitem.para: Use this action to check whether the currently selected table cell is editable or not.

section.para: This action is unsupported for the HTML toolkit
